title: 10th Yr anniversary orb
body: When opening the 10th year advisory orb It showed I got the icon, ward skin, and emote. But, I only got the icon added to my inventory.

replies.body: Same here, except I only got to keep the emote. No matter how many times I've tried restarting my league client the other two gifts (ward and icon) don't want to appear...

Loot has been bugged for a while now where it doesn't immediately show up when you obtain it (this applies to all kinds of loot in general, like redeeming skin shards for skins, ward skins, etc). I think this is a syncing error.

All you need to do is close the client and reopen it, then it will all be there.
I only got the icon! I tried rebooting and it did nothing!

Hey, its been 24 hours and I found something out that might help a few of you. When you are in your wards section click the Mythic icon on the rarity indicator (around the top left of the wards screen under the collections tab) this revealed the ward and it is now showing up in my collection

> [{quoted}](name=Zaharlangan,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=evIg8LWE,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-10-19T01:48:42.787+0000)
>
> Hey, its been 24 hours and I found something out that might help a few of you. When you are in your wards section click the Mythic icon on the rarity indicator (around the top left of the wards screen under the collections tab) this revealed the ward and it is now showing up in my collection

To expand on this, it appears that the 10th anniversary ward will not show up in Collection *only* when sorting by "Set". The "My Collection", "All", and "Tier" sort methods should have it appear in the list.

Sometimes loot (emotes in particular) can take a while to show up. Generally, it's best to give is about 24 hours to see if it shows up, and if it doesn't submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who should be able to resolve the issue.
No, it doesn't just show up over time. You either get it or you don't. This isn't the 1st time I've been awarded with an Emote only to have it never happen ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Tiamek,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=evIg8LWE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-10-18T14:38:51.758+0000)
>
> No, it doesn't just show up over time. You either get it or you don't. This isn't the 1st time I've been awarded with an Emote only to have it never happen ever.

*Generally*, it does just take some time to appear. If that's not happening for you, you need to contact Support in order to resolve the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Zaharlangan,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=evIg8LWE,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-18T03:15:26.147+0000)
>
> When opening the 10th year advisory orb It showed I got the icon, ward skin, and emote. But, I only got the icon added to my inventory.

Same here, I only actually have the Icon in my collection, despite it having told me I received all 3.

And now, on Day 2, I have played and played, and completed the Corki/Ezreal/Graves mission, yet still have not received the Blue Essence. o_O
I only have icon as well
I have the icon and emote, but not the ward. And it's been several hour already. I also log out and in, but it didn't help.
Same, only got the Icon. No Emote. No ward. And they'll never give them to us either.
How can I get that orb, I need to complete all missions ??

> [{quoted}](name=wyN,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=evIg8LWE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-18T07:44:35.535+0000)
>
> How can I get that orb, I need to complete all missions ??

It's the first reward available. So the mission should have appeared (or will appear) on login, then you simply need to complete it (which is pretty easy considering it's "play one game") and the orb will appear in your loot.
can confirm. only have icon in my collection
